summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Chat GPT Trading Analyzer improvements. All requested features working perfectly: settings modal fixes and trading alerts system fully functional.
passed_tests: Trading alerts container visible in top right corner
Trading alert displays correct CALL signal with EUR/USD asset
Alert shows Stop Loss (1.0850) and Take Profit (1.0950) information
Sound toggle button visible in bottom left corner
Sound toggle changes state from ON to OFF and back to ON
Settings modal opens when clicking settings button
Settings modal closes with X button
Settings modal closes when clicking outside (overlay fix working)
Settings modal displays API configuration options correctly
No JavaScript errors detected on page
